description:
Responsive trail running shoes with features that promote a natural gait for hiking in wet conditions. The all-weather version of the beloved Lone Peak is made with an eVent™ bootie construction that allows sweat to escape without letting rain in. Ample room in the toe box allows your toes to spread and splay comfortably during your foot strike, and zero drop promotes a natural stride.

  • eVent™ waterproof-breathable fabric keeps feet dry while letting excess heat escape
  • Printed overlays and toe cap adds durability
  • Altra EGO™ EVA midsole provides a responsive yet soft feel
  • Footshape™ gives your feet more space allowing them to sit naturally
  • MaxTrac™ rubber outsole features Trailclaw™ canted lugs for traction in rugged terrain
name: Altra Lone Peak Low All-Weather 2 Light Trail Shoes - Men's
